Name: Sheep Island
About the game: You've get a no people island. Then there is only one thing to do. Use your hands to increase the number of sheep. Spend your points to place the lambs, feed them grass, and earn more points by increasing them. Right-click to open the menu and use your ability to increase the number of sheep. No save/load at all! 'Sheep Island', a simple and easy sheep breeding game, has just opened!
